/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban architecture. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the city.
